title: Celery Root
description: Watch and learn how to cut celery root using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery.

asset.title: Celery Root
asset.description: Watch and learn how to cut celery root using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery. For more videos, visit www.knifeskills.com
asset.author: Calphalon

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

We're gonna cut up a celery root. This is a great vegetable, super versatile. First thing we're going to do using our Calphalon chef's knife, it's a very stout knife which is perfect for this job, is peel this thing. We're going to utilize a couple different cut here. First thing I want to do is cut this in half to have a nice flat surface so it's stable. We're gonna go back across it and make very thin cuts. we're gonna take some of this and cut it into a matchstick cut. This knife was designed to rock through edgy cut. Our last cut we're going to be large chunk dice or rough chop. So here we have our slices for gratin, match sticks for remoulade, and wedges or rough chop fro mache or raosting
